formatted_address: 4 Bukit Batok Street 41, #01-73/74 Le Quest Shopping Mall, Singapore 657991
name: The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf - Le Quest Mall

reviews.text: I was over the moon when Coffee Bean opened an outlet at Le Quest Mall. There isn‚Äôt any decent cafe serving good coffee and cafe fare in the vicinity. Been here twice for brekkie after a morning walk. I had the Pancakes & Eggs Platter with an Iced Latte on the first visit and was pleasantly pleased‚Ä¶.pancakes were light and fluffy a little cold when it was served. (Maybe due to the cold aircon). The Breakfast Waffle Platter I had on my second visit was a little disappointing. Portion was substantial but the 2 chicken sausages and scrambled eggs seems to overshadow the waffle (only half a round waffle was served) which should have been the main star. The waffle was tough, doughy and dry. I doused the pancake syrup and extra butter on the waffle hoping they will soak through but to no avail. The texture was just too dense. Regular latte was good though. I hope they will beat the odds and stay put because a a lot of other food outlets at Le Quest Mall didn‚Äôt have much staying power. Quiet on weekdays and even on weekends.

06 May 24‚Äô

Every-time when I passed by, the promo poster ‚Äúdiscourage ‚Äù me to going in for a quick meal‚Ä¶.$10 for 2 sets‚Ä¶ $8 for 1 set‚Ä¶..

Thus I end up next doors‚Ä¶.

The volume purchase seem smart moved, hope they will consider set meal promo for single üòÇ

15 May 24‚Äô
Finally this morning I came with my wife, ordered 2 BF with Hzlnut set meal at their offer price $10 for 2 pax.

Ordered time at 0857 am, meal ready to collect at 0909 am.

The meal come with melon fruits, dragon fruits & grapes. Toasted whole meal bread with egg mayonnaise, tuna & lettuce, hazelnut America-no coffee

Hope they will offer breakfast set for one ‚òùÔ∏è! üòÇ

As a ‚Äòregular‚Äô. The staff and their service should be commended, they are friendly, determined and efficient on orders. I hope this 5 star pushes their overall stars to a better deserving rating. This outlet is the best in my opinion, in comparison to their other outlets of the ones I‚Äôve tried in the west. Thank you
Quiet place for a drink but the chai latte has zero froth/foam. Feels more like drain water than a tea. Bad service, black face from staff. Will not visit again.

The food and drinks and services here is much more better than West Mall , only the operating hours is up to 11pm while West Mall is 24hrs . Yes food are the same but the ways they warm up or reheat the food is totally different

vicinity: 4 Bukit Batok Street 41, #01-73/74 Le Quest Shopping Mall
